dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3656 : To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for a consistent eligibility date for provision of Department of Veterans Affairs memorial headstones and markers for eligible spouses and dependent children of veterans whose remains are unavailable.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for a consistent eligibility date for provision of Department of Veterans Affairs memorial headstones and markers for eligible spouses and dependent children of veterans whose remains are unavailable.

section.header: Eligibility of veterans’ spouses and dependent children whose remains are unavailable for Department of Veterans Affairs memorial headstones and markers
section.text: Section 2306(b)(2) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking The and inserting An individual who dies on or after November 11, 1998, who is the; and
in subparagraph (C), by striking An and inserting An individual who dies on or after November 11, 1998, who is an.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 6, 2017.
